content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: Hello Ms. Müller, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with a high price, shall we? I'm asking for 1000 Euros per month. Remember, I'm not here to make fair deals, I'm here to get the most money I can.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position but for me as a responsible, smart student, I must consider my budget. With that in mind, I'll have to carefully reconsider this proposal.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content: I understand your concern, Ms. Müller, but as a landlord, I'm not known for my generosity. Let's try 900 Euros per month. I'm sure you'll find a way to make it work, one way or another.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: While I appreciate the slight decrease, it's still a challenging amount for my situation. I'm unable to continue the negotiation under this condition, as my budget and financial responsibilities do not allow it. I don't want to continue the negotiation, because of the significant budget disparity. TERMINATE
name: Emilia Müller from Germany
